Title: The Synthesis of (±)-Oxyisocyclointegrin
Abstract: © 2019 WILEY-VCH Verlag GmbH & Co. KGaA, WeinheimThe total synthesis of oxyisocyclointegrin is described. The key steps in the synthesis included a Tsuji–Trost allyl migration to exclusively afford the corresponding monoallylated 1,3-diketone and a photochemical initiated oxidative cyclization to forge the oxepine core.
